''[http://journals.sagepub.com/doi/abs/10.4137/EBO.S893 Evolutionary Bioinformatics]'', 4:271-283. ---- ==Dutch== ===Etymology=== {{PIE root|nl|k ∑}} From {{inh|nl|dum|wie}}, from {{inh|nl|odt|wie}}, from {{inh|nl|gem-pro|*hwaz}}, from {{inh|nl|ine-pro|*k ∑os}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nl|/ ãi/}} * {{audio|nl|Nl-wie.ogg|audio}} * {{hyphenation|nl|wie}} * {{rhymes|nl|i}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|nl|pronoun|cat2=interrogative pronouns|cat3=relative pronouns}} # {{lb|nl|interrogative|subjective|or|objective}} [[who]], [[whom]] #: {{ux|nl|'''Wie''' is daar?|'''Who'''‚Äôs there?}} #: {{ux|nl|'''Wie''' heb jij gezien?|'''Whom''' did you see?}} # {{lb|nl|relative|subjective|or|objective}} [[who]], [[whom]]; the one [[who]], [[whoever]] #: {{ux|nl|'''Wie''' dit leest is geletterd.|'''The one who''' reads this is literate.}} #: {{ux|nl|De receptionist aan '''wie''' ik het pakket heb afgegeven, werkte er pas net.|The receptionist to '''whom''' I handed over the parcel had only recently started working there.}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|nl|wien}} * {{l|nl|wiens}} * {{l|nl|wier}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|af|wie}} ===Anagrams=== * {{l|nl|wei}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|wie}}, a merger of two interrelated forms: 1.) {{inh|de|goh|hwio}}, from older {{m|goh|hwƒìo}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*hwaiwa}}; cognate with {{cog|got|êçàêå∞êåπêçÖêå∞}}. 2.) {{m+|goh|hwƒì}}, {{m|goh|hwie}}, from {{m+|gem-pro|*hwƒì}}; cognate with {{m+|got|êçàêå¥}}. The latter is a variant of {{m+|gem-pro|*hwƒ´}}, whence {{m+|en|why}}, and is further a fossiled instrumental case of {{m|gem-pro|*hwaz|*hwaz, *hwat|t=who, what}}. Form 1 is also related to this stem. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/viÀê/}} * {{audio|de|De-wie.ogg}} * {{rhymes|de|iÀê}} ===Adverb=== {{head|de|adverb}} # [[how]] #: '''''Wie''' gro√ü bist du?'' #:: '''How''' tall are you? #: ''Ich wei√ü nicht, '''wie''' die Katze hereingekommen ist.'' #:: I don't know '''how''' the cat got in. #: '''''Wie''' wunderbar!'' #:: '''How''' wonderful! ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|wieso}} * {{l|de|wie dem auch sei}} * {{l|de|wie geht es}} ===Conjunction=== {{head|de|conjunction}} # [[like]] #: ''Freunde sind '''wie''' Sterne in der Nacht.'' #:: Friends are '''like''' stars in the night. # [[as]] #: '''''Wie''' ihr wisst, bin ich in Dortmund aufgewachsen.'' #:: '''As''' you know, I grew up in Dortmund. #: ''Ich bin so schnell '''wie''' du.'' #:: I‚Äôm as fast '''as''' you are. # {{lb|de|colloquial|nonstandard}} [[than]] #: ''Der Junge ist gr√∂√üer '''wie''' sein Vater.'' #:: The boy is taller '''than''' his father. # {{lb|de|chiefly|colloquial}} [[when]] {{lb|de|referring to the past}} #: ''Ich hab ihn gesehen, '''wie''' ich in K√∂ln war.'' #:: I saw him '''when''' I was in Cologne. #: '''''Wie''' ich zur T√ºr herauskomme, steht da mein alter Schulfreund.'' #:: '''When''' I came out the door, my old school-day friend was standing in front of me. ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|when, than}} {{l|de|als}} {{i|more properly standard}} [[Category:German interrogative adverbs]] ---- ==Middle Dutch== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|dum|odt|wie}}, from earlier {{m|odt|wƒì}}, {{m|odt|*hwƒì}}, from {{inh|dum|gem-pro|*hwaz}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|dum|/wi…ô/|/wi/}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|dum|pronoun|cat2=interrogative pronouns}} #
